name: Something Tiles
description:
A game made during an university-project. Was kinda proud of it so i decided to throw it out into the wild.

Place Tiles during stage 1 to fill the void.

Stage 2 builds up on those Stage 1 tiles and are restricted to specific ones.

This continues also in stage 3, but if you have placed your stage 1 and 2 tiles well you will earn a lot of points here.

As of now the game has no Sounds.
